survey.introduction: Hello, we are conducting a very brief non-sales 3 question survey.

questions.question: Are there any smokers aged 21 or over living in your household?
How many smokers are currently living in your household?
Do any members of your household currently smoke WINSTON or CAMEL cigarettes?
Would it be alright for us to send you sample packages of cigarettes for those in your household who are over 21?

phase2.verification: May I verify your name and address and please tell me the usual brand of all 21+ smokers in your household.

survey_es.introduction: Hola, nosotros estamos conduciendo un breve cuestionario de tres preguntas, sin venderle nada, tocante hábitos de fumar.

questions.question: ¿Hay en su hogar personas mayores de 21 años que fuman?
¿Cuántas personas que fuman viven en su hogar?
¿Algunos miembros de su hogar fuman WINSTON o CAMEL?
¿Está de acuerdo que le enviemos una muestra de cigarrillos para los fumadores mayor de 21 años en su hogar?
